title: Our living past
creator_credit: Austral Pacific Productions, Andrew J. Helgeson and Peter Thompson
brief_description: Deals with Australia’s heritage of historic places and buildings existing today, to be used and enjoyed by all. Describes Macquarie’s Old Government House, Sydney, The Rocks, Sydney; Royal Theatre, Hobart; Port Arthur, Tasmania; Windsor Hotel, Melbourne; the Lunatic Asylum, Perth; and many other places throughout Australia Photographed by Peter Leyden and Hans Heidrich. Sound by Kevin McLellan. Commentator, Tim Elliot.
